menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: A classic Italian pizza with a crispy crust, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
menu.ingredients: Tomato sauce, Mozzarella, Basil, Olive oil

menu.name: Beyaynetu
menu.description: A traditional Ethiopian vegetarian platter served with injera and a variety of lentils and vegetables.
menu.ingredients: Injera, Lentils, Cabbage, Beets, Carrots, Spinach

menu.name: Shiro
menu.description: A delicious and spicy Ethiopian chickpea stew served with injera.
menu.ingredients: Chickpea flour, Onion, Garlic, Berbere spice, Oil

menu.name: French Fries
menu.description: Crispy golden French fries served hot with ketchup or your favorite dip.

menu.name: Kitfo
menu.description: A traditional Ethiopian dish made from minced raw beef seasoned with spices and clarified butter.
menu.ingredients: Minced beef, Mitmita, Niter kibbeh (clarified butter), Ayib (cheese)

menu.name: Beef Burger
menu.description: A juicy beef burger with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and special sauce in a toasted bun.
menu.ingredients: Beef patty, Lettuce, Tomato, Cheese, Bun, Sauce
